profile.name: Schoollet
profile.description: Schoollet is a digital transaction and management platform designed for students and canteens. The app allows users to add students, deposit virtual credits, and apply for withdrawals. When a canteen generates a bill, the student's credit balance is automatically deducted through the mobile app. This seamless cashless system ensures efficient transaction management for schools and canteens.
profile.customer_review: Schoollet transformed the way we handle transactions at our school! The cashless system is seamless, and students love the convenience. The team was responsive, professional, and implemented the solution flawlessly. Highly recommended!

features: Seamless mobile app for students and canteen owners with web-based backend and admin panel control.
Students can recharge their app balance and use it for purchases at the canteen.
Secure transactions using either the app or a secret key for quick payments.
Option to order a physical Schoollet card for easy transactions without a phone.
Canteen owners can accept payments directly from students via the app.
Canteen owners can withdraw earned credits as cash by providing bank details.
Students can apply for credit withdrawals and receive funds in their bank accounts.
Admin panel to monitor transactions, user activities, and manage canteen accounts.
Instant transaction history and balance tracking for both students and canteen users.
Secure and fast authentication for seamless transactions.

profile.name: Schoollet Canteen
profile.description: Schoollet Canteen is a mobile application designed for canteens and student transactions. It enables canteen users to create bills, accept cashless payments using virtual credits, and track transactions. The backend is controlled via a web portal, allowing canteens to manage billing, create withdrawal requests, and efficiently handle earnings.
profile.customer_review: Schoollet Canteen has completely streamlined our operations. The ability to generate bills instantly and accept digital payments has made transactions effortless. The web-based backend control is a game changer. Highly recommended for any school canteen!

features: Secure authentication and authorization for canteen owners to access their accounts.
Detailed transaction history with filters for easy tracking of payments and withdrawals.
Role-based access control to ensure secure and restricted access to sensitive data.
Generate and manage Schoollet cards for students who prefer card transactions.
Web-based admin panel for managing canteen transactions and user accounts.
Accept payments from students directly through the app or their secret key.
Track daily, weekly, and monthly sales with real-time transaction history.
Receive instant notifications for new orders and payment transactions.
Withdraw earned credits as cash by providing bank details securely.

profile.name: WeAd
profile.description: WeAd is a web application designed to control an Android TV app for ad management. It allows users to add new ads, connect new screens, and manage which ads run on specific screens. Users can schedule ads with start and end dates, ensuring automatic disabling after expiry. The system provides a seamless and efficient way to manage digital signage.
profile.customer_review: WeAd has revolutionized our digital ad management. The ability to control screens remotely and schedule ads effortlessly has saved us time and increased efficiency. The platform is intuitive, and the automation features are fantastic. Highly recommended!

features: Android TV-based app for managing and displaying ads on screens.
Web-based admin panel for full control over screens and ad placements.
Easily add, remove, and manage multiple screens from a single dashboard.
Remotely add new ads and schedule them for display on selected screens.
Delete or update ads in real time without needing physical access to screens.
Seamless installation process for quickly setting up the app on any screen.

profile.name: Eris
profile.description: Eris is a toll management system designed for toll plaza management, allowing operators to control entry and exit barriers, automate billing, and efficiently manage toll payments. The system enables users to detect vehicles, generate receipts in USD and Canadian dollars, and handle emergency booth barrier operations, ensuring smooth traffic flow and accurate transaction tracking.
profile.customer_review: Eris has streamlined our toll operations significantly! The ability to manage barriers and generate receipts automatically has improved efficiency and reduced manual work. Highly recommended!

features: Automated toll entry and exit barrier control for seamless traffic management.
Real-time billing system to generate accurate toll charges instantly.
User-friendly interface for opening and closing toll barriers with a single click.
Secure authentication and authorization to prevent unauthorized access.
Detailed transaction history for tracking toll payments and vehicle movements.
Web-based admin panel for monitoring toll operations and managing users.
Automated reports and analytics to optimize toll collection and traffic flow.
Seamless integration with payment gateways for cashless transactions.
Vehicle detection system for automatic toll charge calculation.
Emergency barrier control to allow manual override when needed.
Receipt generation in both USD and Canadian dollars.

profile.name: Patreon
profile.description: Patreon is a comprehensive toll management mobile application designed for vehicle users, specifically those using the Ambassador Bridge toll plaza. The app allows users to seamlessly make toll payments in both USD and Canadian dollars, track transactions, and manage multiple vehicles effortlessly. With secure authentication, real-time transaction monitoring, and instant notifications, Patreon ensures a smooth and hassle-free toll payment experience. Its user-friendly interface, digital wallet integration, and automated billing system enhance convenience, making toll payments more efficient and transparent.
profile.customer_review: Patreon has revolutionized toll payments for our users! The online payment system is smooth, secure, and user-friendly. Managing toll expenses has never been easier. Highly recommended!

features: Multi-vehicle management support for users with multiple registered vehicles.
Secure authentication and authorization to protect user data and payments.
Seamless online toll payment system for quick and hassle-free transactions.
Instant notifications and alerts for toll charges and payment confirmations.
Real-time transaction tracking to monitor toll payments and history.
Digital wallet integration for convenient and cashless toll payments.
User-friendly dashboard to manage toll-related services efficiently.
Automated billing system with detailed invoices for transparency.

profile.name: Miles
profile.description: Miles is the backend toll management system for the Patreon and Eris apps, designed for administrators to manage toll operations efficiently. It enables vehicle activation, number plate recognition through image capture, and access to toll plaza cameras. Miles also allows administrators to retrieve government vehicle details based on license plates, monitor transactions, and ensure smooth toll management with real-time insights.
profile.customer_review: Miles has revolutionized toll payments for our users! The online payment system is smooth, secure, and user-friendly. Managing toll expenses has never been easier. Highly recommended!

features: Number plate recognition with image capture for seamless vehicle identification.
Multi-vehicle management support for users with multiple registered vehicles.
Secure authentication and authorization to protect user data and transactions.
Seamless online toll payment system for quick and hassle-free processing.
Instant notifications and alerts for toll charges and payment confirmations.
Real-time transaction tracking for monitoring toll payments and history.
Integration with government databases for vehicle detail verification.
Digital wallet support for convenient and cashless toll payments.
Access to toll plaza cameras for enhanced monitoring and security.
Automated billing system with detailed invoices for transparency.
User-friendly admin dashboard for managing toll operations efficiently.

profile.name: ScentAbility MashGame
profile.description: ScentAbility MashGame is an interactive card-matching mobile game developed using Flutter and SQL. Players match scents with corresponding objects, enhancing their sensory and cognitive skills. The game features multiple levels, timed challenges, and a rewarding progression system, making it engaging for all ages.
profile.customer_review: ScentAbility MashGame is an innovative and fun way to engage the senses! The gameplay is smooth, and the challenges keep players hooked. Highly recommended for all ages!

features: Interactive card-matching gameplay with scent-object associations.
Multiple difficulty levels to challenge players of all ages.
Timed challenges that enhance cognitive and sensory skills.
Rewarding progression system with achievements and unlockables.
User-friendly interface with smooth and responsive gameplay.
Engaging animations and sound effects for an immersive experience.
Offline play support to enjoy the game anytime, anywhere.
Developed using Flutter and SQL for a fast and seamless performance.

profile.name: ScentsAbility JigsawGame
profile.description: ScentsAbility JigsawGame is an interactive mobile puzzle game developed using Flutter. It transforms images into jigsaw puzzles, providing a fun and engaging experience for players of all ages. With smooth animations, intuitive controls, and beautifully crafted visuals, the game offers an enjoyable and immersive puzzle-solving adventure.
profile.customer_review: ScentsAbility JigsawGame is an amazing puzzle game! The interface is smooth, and the gameplay feels so intuitive. The animations and graphics are well-crafted, making it an enjoyable experience. Highly recommended!

features: Engaging jigsaw puzzle gameplay with multiple difficulty levels.
Transforms images into interactive jigsaw puzzles.
High-quality images and smooth animations for an immersive experience.
User-friendly interface with intuitive drag-and-drop mechanics.
Auto-save feature to resume puzzles anytime.
Hint system to assist players when stuck on challenging puzzles.
Customizable puzzle pieces and board settings for personalized gameplay.
Offline mode support to play without an internet connection.
Regular updates with new puzzle packs and themes.
